thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com
thread.title: Richard Sanborn
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Richard Sanborn

author: Richard Sanborn
title: Richard Sanborn
text: The web-site is fine to get an initial review and location. However, booking says nothing about a view with the room, which floor it's going to be on and etc. Since it's our first visit to the island it would have been nice to get a hint or two about the most popular way to travel there and back and maybe some dinning reservations. It's kinda like Nancy Palosi's "Book it and we'll see what we get". Always nice to talk to someone to get a feel for things. Very had to get a phone number for the hotel it self these days.
